keyMappings:
map \ visitPreviousTab
map <c-,> moveTabLeft count=99
map <c-.> moveTabRight count=99
map <c-p> togglePinTab
map <c-m> toggleMuteTab
map <c-f> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
# unmap <a-p>
# unmap <a-m>
# unmap <a-f>
searchEngines:
p: https://www.perplexity.ai/search?q=%s Perplexity
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
